00028 namespace detail { class Serializable; }
00029 
00038 class Serializable : public Object
00039 {
00040 public:
00042     CO_API uint64_t getDirty() const;
00043 
00045     CO_API bool isDirty() const override;
00046 
00048     CO_API virtual bool isDirty( const uint64_t dirtyBits ) const;
00049 
00051     CO_API uint128_t commit( const uint32_t incarnation = CO_COMMIT_NEXT )
00052         override;
00053 
00054 protected:
00056     CO_API Serializable();
00057 
00062     CO_API Serializable( const Serializable& );
00063 
00065     CO_API virtual ~Serializable();
00066 
00068     Serializable& operator = ( const Serializable& from )
00069         { Object::operator = ( from ); return *this; }
00070 
00082     virtual void serialize( co::DataOStream&, const uint64_t ){}
00083 
00094     virtual void deserialize( co::DataIStream&, const uint64_t ){}
00095 
00102     enum DirtyBits
00103     {
00104         DIRTY_NONE       = 0,
00105         DIRTY_CUSTOM     = 1,
00106         DIRTY_ALL        = 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFull
00107     };
00108 
00110     CO_API virtual void setDirty( const uint64_t bits );
00111 
00113     CO_API virtual void unsetDirty( const uint64_t bits );
00114 
00116     ChangeType getChangeType() const override { return DELTA; }
00117 
00119     CO_API void notifyAttached() override;
00120 
00121     void getInstanceData( co::DataOStream& os ) final
00122         { serialize( os, DIRTY_ALL ); }
00123 
00124     CO_API void applyInstanceData( co::DataIStream& is ) final;
00125 
00126     CO_API void pack( co::DataOStream& os ) final;
00127     CO_API void unpack( co::DataIStream& is ) final;
00128 
00129 private:
